articles.description: A man snowmobiling in the Sawtooth National Forest in central Idaho died Friday after triggering a large avalanche.
articles.content:
(CNN)A man snowmobiling in the Sawtooth National Forest in central Idaho died Friday after triggering a large avalanche.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: How a bad response to a weather disaster can ruin a political career
articles.description: The tragic situation in Texas following this week's historic cold snap and power outages has people pointing fingers. Perhaps the ire has been pointed toward no one more than Texas Sen. Ted Cruz, who left the state for Cancun, Mexico.

articles.author: By David Williams, CNN
articles.title: The TSA wants to hire 6,000 new airport security officers by the summer
articles.description: The Transportation Security Administration is working to hire more than 6,000 airport security screening officers ahead of the traditionally busy summer travel season.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: A 90-year-old Seattle woman walks six miles in snow to get her Covid-19 vaccine
articles.description: Many people in the US are determined to get their Covid-19 vaccine, but a 90-year-old Seattle resident showed just how motivated she was by walking six miles in snow to make her appointment.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Why Joe Biden went to Wisconsin -- and will be back
articles.description: President Joe Biden took his first big trip as president this week when he went to Wisconsin for a CNN town hall. The fact that Biden chose to go to Wisconsin shouldn't be lost on anyone. He will likely be going to the state a lot as president.

articles.description: Members of Congress, including Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-NY), visited Texas after a winter storm left residents to deal with massive power outages and water shortages.

articles.title: Quadriplegic man who walked down aisle at wedding speaks about his accident
articles.description: After suffering a spinal cord injury in a 2010 college football game, Chris Norton had only a 3% chance of ever moving again. He speaks to CNN's Michael Smerconish about defying the odds and walking across his graduation stage, and eventually, down the aisle …

articles.title: Smerconish takes on Limbaugh's legacy
articles.description: CNN's Michael Smerconish looks at the complicated legacy of late talk radio host Rush Limbaugh. Smerconish points out Limbaugh was a gifted showman but unfortunately enabled those with microphones to supplant traditional political leadership.

articles.title: Beloved canine moves on after helping hospital staff through a year of the pandemic
articles.description: Staff members at a Denver hospital have said a sad goodbye to Wynn, their canine companion for nearly two years and a presence during the Covid-19 pandemic that proved especially helpful.

articles.author: Chauncey Alcorn, CNN Business
articles.title: Black women executives making history in the c-suite offer career advice to those following in their footsteps
articles.description: Kamala Harris's swearing-in as the nation's first woman, Black and southeast Asian vice president comes at a pivotal moment for Black women in the business world, as businesses struggle to increase the number of up Black executives in its ranks.
